name: Amanda Stories
summary: Amanda Stories was the one of the very first "point-and-click" programs for kids. Not only is there a strong narrative--in ten separate stories Inigo explores his house, his dream, the outside world, and Your Faithful Camel ventures as far afield as the North Pole--but where you click actually determines the course of the story. As children (ages 3 and up) move intuitively through one adventure after another, the combination of color animations, great sound effects, original music, and a variety of endings challenges and delights them.
